meta.title: Our Story - KeepsVault
meta.description: Learn about the story behind KeepsVault and why we built it.

beginning.title: The Beginning
beginning.p1: KeepsVault started with a simple problem: keeping important documents organized and accessible when you need them most.
beginning.p2: After years of struggling with scattered files, forgotten passwords, and lost documents, we knew there had to be a better way.
beginning.p3: We envisioned a secure, simple platform that would help people organize their most important information and share it safely with family and professionals.

truth.title: The Truth About Document Management
truth.p1: Most people struggle with document organization because existing solutions are either too complex or not secure enough.
truth.p2: We believe that everyone deserves access to tools that make life easier, not harder.
list: Documents should be easy to find when you need them
Sharing should be simple but secure
Your data should always remain yours
The interface should be intuitive for everyone
